Articles.Content: I think the title is self explanatory, so I'll just get to the why. I like the visibility of cupolas. Especially for rovers. Its rather limiting to have a cupola for virtually every size and form factor except 1.25m.

Do you want it just as an aesthetic option, or do you want it to be an actual cockpit from which to steer?

Stockalike Station Parts Expansion has a small cupola, but it's not a cockpit, only an aesthetic part. You might be able to make it a cockpit with a MM patch, but as the model doesn't have a hatch IIRC, the Kerbal wouldn't be able to exit to take surface samples.
